requirement_details.title: Customer Registration API
requirement_details.description: POST /customers endpoint for registering new customers

compliance_impact: PCI DSS compliance requirement: Customer data handling
GDPR compliance requirement: Personal data processing
stakeholder_notification: Frontend Team - UI components dependent on this API
Database Team - Customer table schema dependencies
QA Team - Multiple test cases require updates
Security Team - PCI DSS compliance verification needed
Compliance Team - GDPR impact assessment required
recommended_actions: 1. Notify all affected teams before making changes
2. Update API documentation and OpenAPI specification
3. Modify dependent UI components to handle API changes
4. Update database schema if customer data structure changes
5. Revise test cases for API, UI, and integration testing
6. Conduct security review for PCI DSS compliance
7. Perform GDPR impact assessment for data processing changes
8. Update Redux state management for customer data
9. Coordinate deployment with all affected systems
